title: Nursing Service-Learning Education: Diabetes Camp Field-Linked Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory and basic patient care concepts
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term course for graduate nursing students: Designing service-learning experiences linked to community diabetes camps, conducted via a smartphone-based LMS

learning_goals: Students can acquire basic nursing skills for diabetic patients and families and apply them in field settings
Experiences contributing to community health promotion projects through service-learning activities can be shared
Insights and confidence gained during service-learning can be evaluated through reflective journaling

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
